Add Controls and Bind Properties

In Smart Template List Reports (STLR) and Smart Template Object Pages (STOP), you can add controls and bind properties in more than one way.

This table summarizes the ways of editing control text and labels and binding object properties in smart templates.
Table 12. How to edit controls and bind properties

Location in the smart template

You want to

Action

Data tab

Add a data model

 Drag the Excel file from its folder on your local drive to the panel under the Data tab.

Smart Template List Reports - Page title

Give the page a title
  • Select the text on the page and edit in-line
  • Select the page in the Outline, then type a title for the page in the Page Title box under Properties.

Smart Template List Reports- Object

Select the object for the page
  • Drag the object that you want to use from the Data panel to the table of the list report.

Smart Template List Reports - Filter name

Give the filter a name
  • Select the text on the page and edit in-line.
  • Select the filter in the Outline, then type the text in the Description box in the Properties.

Smart Template List Reports - Filter on

Select the property that you want to filter.

Select the property from the list in the Filter on box.

Smart Template List Reports - Table

Give the table a title

Select the table, then type a name in the Title field under Properties.

Smart Template List Reports -Column header

Give the column a title
  • Select the column header on the page and edit in-line.
  • Select the column, then type the text in the Header field under Properties.

Smart Template List Reports - Action button

Edit text
  • Select the button on the page and edit in-line.
  • Select the button in the Outline, then type the text in the Label field in the Properties.

Smart Template Object Pages - Page header

Edit page title
  • Select the text on the page and edit in-line
  • Select the header in the Outline, then type a title for the page in the Page Title box under Properties.

Smart Template Object Pages - Page header

Edit the title
  • Drag the property from the Data panel to the Title in the header.
  • Select the property from the list in the Title box under Properties. text on the page and edit in-line
  • Select the header in the Outline, then type a title for the page in the Title box under Properties.

Smart Template Object Pages - Header

Edit the description
  • Select the object property that you want to appear in the header and drag it over the Description in the header.
  • Select the property from the list in the Text box under Properties.
  • Select the header in the Outline, then type a title for the page in the Title box under Properties.
  • Select the text on the page and edit in-line.

Smart Template Object Pages - Header - KPIs

Edit KPIs
  • Select the KPI in the Outline, then type a title Title box under Properties.
  • Select the property from the list in the Value box under Properties, or
  • Select the object property that you want to use as the KPI and drag it to the KPI in the header.

Smart Template Object Pages - Header contacts

Add header contact
  • Select the contact property from the list under Data
  • Select titles and subtitles in the appropriate boxes.

Smart Template Object Pages - Header forms

Edit header form
  • Select the text on the page and edit in-line
  • Select the header form in the Outline, then type a title in the Title box under Properties.

Smart Template Object Pages - Header form labels

Edit header form labels
  • Select the text on the page and edit in-line
  • Select the label form in the Outline, then type a title in the Title box under Properties.

Smart Template Object Pages - Header form values

Edit header form values
  • Select the object property that you want to appear in the header form and drag it over the Value in the header.
  • Select the property from the lists in the boxes under Properties.

Smart Template Object Pages - Section

Edit the section title

Select the section in the Outline, then edit the title under Properties.

Smart Template Object Page - Form group title

Edit the title
  • Select the text on the page and edit in-line
  • Select the form group in the Outline, then type a title for the form group in the Title box under Properties.

Smart Template Object Page - Form group label -

Edit label
  • Select the text on the page and edit in-line
  • Select the form element in the Outline, then type a title for the form group in the Label box under Properties.

Smart Template Object Page - Form element labels

Edit labels
  • Select the text on the page and edit in-line
  • Select the form element in the Outline, then type a label in the Label box under Properties.

Smart Template Object Page - Form element codes, descriptions, and texts

Edit
  • Drag the property from the Data pane to the text
  • Select the form elements in the Outline, then select the property from the list under Properties.

.Smart Template Object Page - Table

Select navigation

Select the table, then the value from the Items box.

Smart Template Object Page - Column

Edit header
  • Select the column header on the page and edit in-line.
  • Select the column in the Outline, then type the text in the Header field in the Properties.

Smart Template Object Page - Column

Values in columns
  • Select the text on the page and edit in-line
  • Select the column in the Outline, then type a text in the appropriate boxes under Properties.
